text:
To test using multiple users, it is necessary to use multiple computers and to 
use JMeter in the Client/Server configuration.

The documentation says to enter 'comma delimited' IP numbers into the 
jmeter.properties file.

I did this but I placed a space after each comma (oops) to enhance readability 
and for easier maintainence (The IPs change daily so this file changes daily).

JMeter quite happily displayed the IP numbers under the Run->Remote Start menu 
option but could not connect to the remote computers.
A check of the log showed 'malformed URL' errors.

To fix this problem, a left (and right?) trim of 'blank spaces' from the IP 
numbers would be needed and would enable people to have spaces in their comma 
delimited IP string.

Thanks for the excellent product and keep up the great work. :-)

Martin Carroll.
Senior Test Analyst.
creator: martin_carroll@hotmail.com
